meanings.definition: To react more strongly or emotionally than is necessary or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: Sometimes I overreact when I lose a game.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overreact to small problems.
meanings.sent3: Don't overreact if you spill a little juice.
meanings.sent4: His reaction to the news was like a storm, he really overreacted.
meanings.sent5: Try not to overreact to criticism, take it as a chance to improve.

meanings.definition: To respond excessively or disproportionately to a situation.
meanings.sent1: I tend to overreact when I'm running late.
meanings.sent2: He always seems to overreact to minor issues.
meanings.sent3: She will overreact if you change her routine.
meanings.sent4: His reaction was like a volcano erupting, he really overreacted.
meanings.sent5: Try not to overreact to a small mistake, stay calm and think it through.
